attributes.action: ABOLISH MEANS TESTING FOR ALL SENIOR CITIZEN LONG TERM FAMILY MEMBER CARERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These dedicated people give comfort and care for thier loved one 24/7, 365/6, many without respite. Transporting them to hospitals, doctors surgeries, and to clinics, paid for out of thier benefit (pension). What little they have saved during a lifetime of bringing up a family is slowly being eroded via the steady continuing price increases of basic needs,:food,water,lighting, heating,council taxes. All the savings that is made by these governmental bodies is subsequently squandered.
